# Guitar Fretboard Learning Game - Angular Application

## Project Overview
An Angular-based guitar fretboard learning game with realistic graphics and animations.

## Project Type
Angular web application with TypeScript

## Completed Steps
- ✓ Created project directory structure
- ✓ Created copilot-instructions.md

## Next Steps
- Create Angular project with ng new
- Implement fretboard component
- Add game logic
- Style with realistic graphics
